title: Sculpted Poro cake!
body:
Hello, everyone! I'm not anyone special, but I did want to share my own art with you. I go to school for baking and pastry, and chose the theme of video games for our sculpted cakes. Naturally, I had to make something from LoL. Thus, the Poro cake was born! Keep in mind, I'm still rather new to this, but I did try my best. C:

~~(also I hope i'm adding the pictures right i'm not sure how the forums really work)~~

replies.body: I am salivating looking at that adorable little guy. Poro's never looked so scrumptious!

That's adorable!

But... that means...

Someone has to eat something that is poro-shaped D= How could they live with themselves for eating something so adorable ='C
Fear not, friend! :D It's only for display, and will not be eaten. <3

I don't know, I kinda like the idea of eating poro cake. :-)

Awesome work, by the way!

*Waves flag with poro icon on it*

Yay! =)

ahahaha this is great

it's a

poro snack
Needs a Braum cake to go with it.
{{champion:31}} OM NOM NOM NOM NOM TASTY PORO
OMG this looks amazing was it hard/did it take a long time for you to complete?
